articles.description: Tributes are flowing for Don Talbot, who led Australia's swimming team for successful stints in the late 60s and 70s and again in the 90s and early 2000s. The highlight of those stints, was Australia's performance at the 2000 Olympics.
articles.content:
Tributes are flowing for the Australian swimming coach and sports administrator, Don Talbot, who has died peacefully on the Gold Coast, aged 87.

articles.description: South Africa have decided between the northern and southern hemispheres.
